title: Did Princess Diana Leave Prince Harry a $10M Inheritance?
subtitle: In an interview with Oprah Winfrey in early 2021, Prince Harry and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex discussed their rift with the British royal family.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Diana Spencer, Prince Harry's mother, left her son with an inheritance of around $10 million after she was killed in a car accident in 1997.
